comments.body: This post in reserved for future project announcements

comments.author: c0ldbrewz
comments.body: wow one of the task is worth like $80  how long does it takes usually for team to check the tasks that in "sent to check" phase? and how long does it takes for reward to be sent after user done 1 task?are you guys sent the reward daily? weekly?

comments.author: valokoso
comments.body: depends on the task itself. Some of them - once in a few days. But there are monthly tasks that are only checked once the month ends. Like there's one for telegram chat superstar - that's only 1 person, that's performed better than the rest during the month. So once the month is over - the 'hero' is chosen.

comments.author: c0ldbrewz
comments.body: Quote from: valokoso on January 27, 2023, 11:57:00 AMdepends on the task itself. Some of them - once in a few days. But there are monthly tasks that are only checked once the month ends. Like there's one for telegram chat superstar - that's only 1 person, that's performed better than the rest during the month. So once the month is over - the 'hero' is chosen. because the nature of telegram chat superstar is more like contest that won by 1 person is understandable they checked it once a month.i'm more curious with task that give reward to everyone like reddit task and youtube task, how long they gonna process the reward?all of my task from 2 days ago are now in "complete" status, looks like the checking process take 2 days.

comments.author: valokoso
comments.body: More like biweekly. But then again depends on the task

comments.author: c0ldbrewz
comments.body: already got the answer, at the end of weekend every week.if the task was done on the weekend (ex: friday or saturday), the payment will be sent on the next weekend.ah "valokoso", i just realized that i am speaking with the head marketing of UBIX  nice to meet you
